Structure.name: Structure
Structure.exampleText: Components and their static wiring, assembly, and allocation

Behavior.name: Behavior
Behavior.description: Behavior of the system and its components as well as their communication.
Behavior.exampleText: The handling of sensitive data within a component.

Environment.name: Environment
Environment.description: System's context, including hardware resources and the external situation.
Environment.exampleText: The physical location of a database.
